data.eml:eml: Redescription of Arcotheres placunae (Hornell & Southwell, 1909) (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Pinnotheridae) from India and Pakistan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Trivedi, Jigneshkumar N., Vachhrajani, Kauresh D., Ng, Peter K. L. (2018): Redescription of Arcotheres placunae (Hornell & Southwell, 1909) (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Pinnotheridae) from India and Pakistan. Zootaxa 4433 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4433.1.2
